libs.description: Adds support for a native file chooser for opening files of any specified set of extensions and/or mimetypes.

libs.description: A Helper library for basic styling with code in Codename One. This eliminates the need to have endless UIID in your GUI builder

libs.description: Stream API from Java 8 rewritten on iterators for Codename One.

libs.description: Codename One Port of FontBox. Provides TTF font support with added features like stroking, filling, scaling, transforming, etc...

libs.description: Codename One support for Freshdesk.\nThis library wraps the native iOS and Android SDKs to provide a single cross-platform Java API\n that can be used in a Codename One project.

libs.name: Codename One GeoViz Library
libs.description: This library provides support for loading GeoJSON data in a Codename One application. It also provides a component to render the GeoJSON data.

libs.name: Codename One Google Native Maps Support
libs.description: Allows Codename One developers to embed native Google Maps on iOS, Android, and Javascript. Uses Google maps in BrowserComponent on simulator and falls back to Codename One\n MapComponent on UWP.

libs.description: A library for parsing HTML to standard XML DOM

libs.description: A library to read and write JSON in Codename One

libs.description: This library was started as an attempt to add sockets support to Codename One. \nSupports iOS, Android, Blackberry, JavaSE and J2ME.

libs.name: Multipart Upload text file request and track upload progress
libs.description: This lib will work as is but it's more of an example of how this can be achieved so that you can implement your own code. For example you might want to upload non-text (binary) files instead of text files. Or you might wat to upload files + parameters (there is a commented example in the code)

libs.name: Video Optimizer
libs.description: It allows to get info about a video (duration, bitrate, size), get a preview image of a video and optimize a video for fast upload. It can also be used to check if a given file is a supported video.

libs.description: The purpose of this CN1Lib is to add live streaming capabilities to iOS and Android Codename One apps, hiding all the complexities and reducing the effort.
